* Iris listened to SnowCat.*

" Of course you miss it, SnowCat. I would too if I was in your place."

* She then paused in her speech, actually wishing that she could move around 
on her own and experience things.
But then again, that was hoping for just a bit too much. And in truth she 
really didn't mind what she was.
With a sigh she spoke again.*

" Believe me, you DO indeed need to be here. And as you can see if you look 
around, the Maximals need all the help they can get."
